entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Goderich
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:48 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Goderich 1:00 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Temperature: 0.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 85 %
Dewpoint: -2.2°C
Wind: ENE 32 km/h gust 44 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 late this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A few flurries. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
